title: Uncut Gems
short_plot_summary: A charismatic New York City jeweler and gambling addict risks everything in pursuit of the ultimate win.
explanation: A gem, representing the rare Ethiopian black opal that Howard Ratner acquires
A basketball, signifying the NBA championship game that Howard bets on, involving one of his clients, Kevin Garnett
A stack of money, symbolizing Howard's gambling addiction and the massive debts he accrues throughout the movie
A running man, illustrating the constant race against time and pressure that Howard experiences due to his risky decisions
A gun, reflecting the deadly consequences and dangerous situations Howard faces as a result of his involvement with criminals
